verses.name: Daniel 7:1
verses.text: In the first year of Belshazzar king of Babylon Daniel had a dream and visions of his head upon his bed: then he wrote the dream, and told the sum of the matters.

verses.name: Daniel 7:2
verses.text: Daniel spake and said, I saw in my vision by night, and, behold, the four winds of the heaven strove upon the great sea.

verses.name: Daniel 7:3
verses.text: And four great beasts came up from the sea, diverse one from another.
